set.name: Duema Gacharange Explosive Speed Start 52 Card Deck Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Master Dragon/Jokers/Wonderforce

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 3 or more Jokers in the battle zone, this creature gets +3000 power. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may have more than 2 of this card in your super gacharange. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: Duema Gacharange Explosive Speed Start 52 Card Deck Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever it attacks, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, gacharange summon. {GACHARANGE SUMMON} (Gacharange summon: Summon the top card of your super gacharange with its cost paid.)
